title: Visualization of Arlington's Budgets/Expenses
preview: An interactive tool to learn more about the town of Arlington, Massachusetts.
content: Easy-to-use visualizer tool to see where town tax dollars go in a visual map, both in the past and in the future. See either [Revenues](http://arlingtonvisualbudget.org/revenues) or [Expenses](http://arlingtonvisualbudget.org/expenses), and use the year at the top right to explore over time.

title: Data visualizations/Infographics about Arlington (Cleargov)
preview: Arlington, MA | Financial & Demographic Profile | ClearGov
content: Infographics and simple data visualizations about basic town demographics and finances, including [**comparisons** to other eastern MA towns](https://www.cleargov.com/massachusetts/middlesex/town/arlington/2018/expenditures?breakdowntype=department&objectid=862244) in terms of numbers (financial included).  High level information in a simple to read format.

title: Envision Arlington ABC's Of Town Government (pp12)
content: A primer and overview of how town government works, with org charts and descriptions of key town bodies; a great place to start to see which boards/departments do what.

title: Arlington's Open Checkbook Of Expenses Paid
preview: Arlington's Open Checkbook provides financial transparency to the public with easy access to the Town's expenditure information for the current fiscal year, as well as a historical view of previous years. This interactive website can be used to search details of government spending by category, ...
content: Checkbook viewer to see actual expenses paid by different town departments - encourages you to explore specific departments, vendors, or dates.  Also includes a separate [Payroll Summary](https://www.arlingtonma.gov/home/showdocument?id=51034).

content: Official Town Manager submitted budgets for the town, as presented to Town Meeting. Includes back to FY2007. Entire budgets are large 250 page PDF documents; starting with individual sections may be easier.

title: FY2020 Pay and Classification Plan (Warrant Article 48)(pp17)
content: Detailed salary and pay scales for town employees submitted to Town Meeting, including union and non-union positions.

title: APS Draft Five-Year Budget Plan 2020-2024 (pp25)

preview: Capital Planning Reports Submitted to Town Meeting The Capital Planning Committee was established by the 1986 Arlington Town Meeting to assist the Town Manager in preparing a multi-year capital plan. The Capital Planning Committee prepares a report to Town Meeting that contains detailed financial information relating to Arlington’s multi-year Capital Improvement Program.

title: Finance Committee Homepage
preview: View past Finance Committee Meetings on ACMi. The Arlington Finance Committee (FinCom) is a standing committee of the Town Meeting. Its purpose is to recommend a vote to Town Meeting on the Town budget and all articles that require an appropriation. The FinCom reviews each department's ...
content: The Arlington Finance Committee (FinCom) is a standing committee of the Town Meeting. Its purpose is to recommend a vote to Town Meeting on the Town budget and all articles that require an appropriation. The FinCom reviews each department's budget in detail and holds hearings on Town Meeting appropriation articles...

title: Assessor's Office - Property & Excise Tax Information
content: Assessor office homepage with formal tax classifications about propery, excise (cars), and other town taxes.

title: Treasurer/Collector Homepage And Tax Payments
preview: The Office of the Treasurer and Collector of Taxes consists of five divisions headed by the Treasurer/Collector of Taxes. content: The Office of the Treasurer and Collector of Taxes consists of five divisions headed by the Treasurer/Collector of Taxes. The five divisions are: Treasury, Collector, Payroll, Parking Clerk, and service support divisions. Includes explanations of property taxes and ways to pay town bills.

title: Census & Demographic Data Visualizations for Arlington (DataUSA)
preview: In 2017, Arlington, MA had a population of 45k people with a median age of 41.4 and a median household income of $103,594. Between 2016 and 2017 the population of Arlington, MA grew from 44,408 to 44,992, a 1.32% increase and its median household income grew from $98,103 to $103,594, a 5.6% increase.
content: Another data visualizer, focusing on showing detailed charts and year-over-year changes drawing on many different US Census and other official sources.
